title: What do you think about BTS winning a Grammy? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm not really someone who keeps up with the Grammy awards each year so I can't really tell you exactly what's going to happen at the award show this year. But, I heard that BTS is nominated for the best album packaging and here's my thoughts about it. BTS Album Earns 2019 Grammy Nomination: Here's Why It's Important Now let me get to your question, I think that BTS has a chance to win the award in that certain category but not in other main categories. The reason why I think that BTS will be able to win the album packaging category and as to how and why they deserve to win in the album packaging category is mainly because BTS or any Kpop artists actually have better album packaging than any American artist. Kpop artists are usually more creative in their album packages than American artists as the American artists don't usually care for their album packaging. Besides, most Americans fans like to download or buy songs online through iTunes and such. However, I think that's probably much it to how many awards the Grammy will give to them this year. I personally don't think that they deserve to win any Grammy award in other categories just YET because if you actually look at all of the American artists, there is actually a lot more better and well deserved artists out there than BTS themselves. BTS may seem like they've done a big impact in the music industry which is true because getting big from a small company like Big Hit while being a Kpop band from South Korea wasn't easy. But if you look at it at a bigger aspects, BTS seem to be lacking more than some of the other artists in the American industry. Besides, I think that it's too soon if they win a Grammy considering the fact that their songs aren't a big of a hit in the US compared to other big artists. BTS winning a Grammy is also kind of like a funny idea because they haven't really won any other awards in the US which is actually based on their musicality. They've won Top Social Artist at BBMAS two times now but does that even have anything to do with their talents in producing music? No. So yeah, I don't think that they should win a Grammy yet in terms of other main categories but having them to win best album packaging is pretty good though it may have seem like the award organizer just wanted BTS to come to their show for ratings and views.
